Package org.pac4j.http.client.direct

Class DirectDigestAuthClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<C,​U>
        • org.pac4j.core.client.DirectClient<DigestCredentials,​CommonProfile>
          • org.pac4j.http.client.direct.DirectDigestAuthClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client<DigestCredentials,​CommonProfile>
    public class DirectDigestAuthClient
extends DirectClient<DigestCredentials,​CommonProfile>

    This class is the client to authenticate users directly through HTTP digest auth.

    Add the commons-codec dependency to use this class.

    Since:
    1.9.0
    Author:
    Mircea Carasel
